name: Necromancer (itch) (Käsityökerho, Reaktori, Riuku)
description:
You play as a necromancer who decides to find romance. You've been told that you might find your destined partner in a castle nearby. Find your way to the castle with the help of your lovely minions.

Made for the 33rd gm(48) game jam in 48 hours.

Credits: Reaktori, Riuku.
